metadata.title: Mind/Body/Will Architectural Separation Rules
metadata.description: Constitutional rules enforcing the three-layer architecture

rules.title: Mind Layer: No Database Access
rules.statement: Mind layer components MUST NOT access database infrastructure
rules.rationale: Mind defines law but never executes. Database access is execution, not governance.

rules.title: Mind Layer: No Filesystem Writes
rules.statement: Mind layer components MUST NOT write to filesystem
rules.rationale: Mind may read .intent/ but never mutates. Law does not modify itself.

rules.title: Mind Layer: No Body Invocation
rules.statement: Mind layer components MUST NOT import or invoke Body layer
rules.rationale: Mind defines rules. Body executes. Mind never invokes execution.

rules.title: Mind Layer: No Will Invocation
rules.statement: Mind layer components MUST NOT import or invoke Will layer
rules.rationale: Mind defines rules. Will decides. Mind never makes decisions.

rules.title: Body Layer: No Rule Evaluation
rules.statement: Body layer components MUST NOT evaluate constitutional rules
rules.rationale: Body executes actions. Mind evaluates rules. Body never decides legality.

rules.title: Will Layer: No Direct Database Access
rules.statement: Will layer components MUST NOT import get_session directly
rules.rationale: Will decides and orchestrates. Body executes. Will delegates infrastructure access to Body.

rules.title: Will Layer: No Direct Filesystem Operations
rules.statement: Will layer components SHOULD delegate filesystem operations to Body
rules.rationale: Will may read for context but should not implement filesystem operations directly.

rules.title: Will Layer: Must Delegate to Body
rules.statement: Will layer orchestration components SHOULD import and delegate to Body services
rules.rationale: Will orchestrates by delegating to Body, not by implementing directly.

rules.title: API Layer: No Direct Database Access
rules.statement: API layer components MUST NOT import get_session directly
rules.rationale: API is entrypoint boundary. All work must route through Will, not directly to infrastructure.

rules.title: API Layer: Must Route Through Will
rules.statement: API route handlers SHOULD delegate all logic to Will layer
rules.rationale: API translates requests to Will. API never implements business logic.

rules.title: API Layer: No Body Bypass
rules.statement: API layer components SHOULD NOT directly import Body services
rules.rationale: API should route through Will, not bypass to Body directly.

rules.title: Cross-Layer: No Body to Will
rules.statement: Body layer components MUST NOT import or invoke Will layer
rules.rationale: Body executes. Will decides. Execution never chooses strategy.

rules.title: Cross-Layer: Mind Never Executes
rules.statement: Mind layer components MUST NOT perform I/O operations or invoke actions
rules.rationale: Mind is law. Law never executes itself.

rules.title: Shared Layer: No Strategic Decisions
rules.statement: Shared infrastructure components MUST NOT make strategic decisions or orchestrate workflows
rules.rationale: Shared provides utilities. Utilities are tools, not decision-makers.

notes: These rules restore CORE's founding architectural principle
Mind/Body/Will separation was diluted during development
This constitutional law makes it explicit and enforceable
All violations must be remediated, not justified
